attributes.action: Make Disney remake Mulan with Mushu and include the full music soundtrack!
attributes.additional_details:
Firstly: Mushu - perhaps one of the best characters in the film has apparently been left out of the new film, I feel shocked and betrayed

Secondly: the soundtrack is incredible, we need our moment to burst out into song again! I find myself furiously typing this so much so that I'm never gonna catch my breath might aswell Say good-bye to those who knew me Boy, was I a fool in school for cutting gym!
attributes.background:
Let's get down to business, to defeat, the Disney! I feel personally offended that they have decided to re-make Mulan with NO music and NO Mushu!! 

This is completely unacceptable and I feel like my childhood has been ruined! Not only that but Donny Osmond could probably do with the gig!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for Disney and not the UK Government or Parliament.
